name: The MathMatrix (Android)
description: This program is a math multiple choice quiz game that you can only pay if you have an ANDROID PHONE there is a PC version too if you wanna check that out https://its-avs.itch.io/the-mathamatrix . the concept is fairly simple you get to chose between 4 concepts Addition substractions and Multiplication and Division and you get to play any one of them, for each question you get right you get 10 points and your highscore gets stored and displayed to you, the goal of the game is to constantly beat your highscore get better at math and have fun.
